md:
giải nghĩa từ "uncomfortable" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Uncomfortable** (adjective)

* Meaning: không thoải mái, không dễ chịu
* Part of speech: adjective
* Example sentence: The new shoes were uncomfortable, so I had to return them.
* Related words: uncomfortable, uncomfortably, discomfort
* Antonyms: comfortable, cozy, pleasant

Note: Uncomfortable can be used to describe physical or emotional discomfort. For example, "The room was uncomfortable because it was too hot" or "I felt uncomfortable when I had to speak in front of a large crowd."
